description:
Susano’o has to prove his worth, a Satori woman finds her man, and a cheapo meets his match.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yamata no Orochi / Satori Onna to Okeya / Nioi no Okaeshi
Yamata no Orochi / The Satori Woman and the Bucket Maker / Return the Smell
ヤマタノオロチ / サトリ女と桶屋 / 匂いのお返し
